description: This table contains the IDs of the specimens (HSC records) that were collected with this order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with an order record. Multiple specimens can be associated with one order record.

columns.name: SPEC_COLL_ID
columns.description: The IDs of specimens (HSC) collected for an order.
